d16a5e81d44b.title: It will be interesting to see how many trolls think “too much information is a bad thing!”

paragraphs.text: It will be interesting to see how many trolls think “too much information is a bad thing!” And how we’ll have any interest in the “second hand” lies they offer. No, we still think the sky is blue, and the grass is green. But please keep trying, and no doubt the masses of us joined together in the name of truth and justice will be persuaded by injustice and lies! HA! (Laughter really IS the best medicine!)
paragraphs.name: e7dc

e0288ed69869.title: ThinkProgress has been tracking hate since Trump’s election. Here’s what we found.

paragraphs.text: ThinkProgress has been tracking hate since Trump’s election. Here’s what we found.
paragraphs.name: 9f20

paragraphs.text: Strangely (not!) no mention of the hate and violence committed by the liberals in “protest” of Trump being elected! Liberals hate the fact that the liberal agenda has been soundly rejected in the voting booth. Their hate for real morals and values continues as they demonstrate their hate for how democracy actually works. They just can’t imagine a world where unequal things aren’t considered equal. Shocker!

paragraphs.text: 261? For a 3-month period? That seems absurdly low.
paragraphs.name: d286

paragraphs.text: The FBI reported an average of 487 hate crimes per month for 2015, 456 hate crimes per month for 2014 and 494 hate crimes per month for 2013.
